verses.text: Ixlajwi yek' jun pekti’, ix ak'ji proval winhaj Abraham yuj Dios, ix avtaj winh, ix tak'vi winh icha tik: --Ina vajek' tik Mamin, xchi winh.

Ix yalan Dios t'a winh icha tik: --Ik'b'at winhaj Isaac jun pitanh uninal te xajan uuj, tzach b'at t'a lum Moriah. Ayic tzach k'och t'a sjolom lum tzalan ol in ch'ox t'ayach, ata' ol a nhustz'a winh silab'il t'ayin, xchi Dios.

Axo t'a junxo k'u, te ak'valto ix q'ue vaan winhaj Abraham chi'. Ix yak'anoch stz'um nok' sb'uru winh, ix xican te' sk'atzitzal jun silab' chi' winh. Ix yik'anb'at winhaj Isaac yuninal yet' chavanh eb' schecab', ix b'at winh yet' eb' t'a jun lugar ix yal Dios chi'.
Axo t'a schab'jial, najatto ix yilb'at lum tzalan chi' winh.

Ix yalan winh t'a eb' schecab' chi': --Cananhec t'a tik yet' nok' b'uru tik, a inxo yet' winh vuninal tik, ol onh b'at t'a chi', yic scaq'uem co b'ha t'a co Mam Dios. Slajvi chi', ol onh jax t'ayex, xchi winh t'a eb'.
Ixlajwi chi' ix yak'an te' k'atzitz chi' winh scuch winhaj Isaac chi', ix yik'anb'at scuchilub' winh yet' sk'ak', ix b'at eb' schavanhil.

Quenanto wal sb'at eb', ix yalan winhaj Isaac chi' t'a winh smam chi' icha tik: --Mamin, xchi winh. --¿Tas xchi vuninal? xchi winhaj Abraham chi'. --Ina qued'nac co k'atzitz yet' co k'ak', ¿b'aj ay pax nok' calnel ol och silab'il chi'? xchi winh.
--Ach vuninal, ha Dios ol ak'an nok', xchi winh. Ix b'eynhejb'at eb'.

Axo ix k'och eb' b'aj ix yal Dios chi', ix sb'oan jun altar winhaj Abraham chi', ix sb'oanq'ue te' k'atzitz chi' winh t'a yib'anh. Ixlajwi chi' ix tzuyan winh yuninal winh chi', ix yak'anq'ue winh t'a yib'anh te' k'atzitz chi'.
Ix yik'ancot q'uen cuchilub' chi' winh yic smilancham yuninal winh chi' silab'il.
Axo yángel Jehová ix avajemta t'a satcha’anh icha tik: --Abraham, Abraham, xchi. --¿Tas xchi Mamin? xchi winh.

Ix yalan jun ángel chi': --Manh ak'och a k'ab' a milancham winh uninal chi'. Ix vojtaquejeli to ay velk'och t'a yol a sat, yujto maj a tenek' ak'an jun pitanh uninal chi' t'ayin, xchi yángel Jehová chi'.

Ix b'at q'uelnaj winhaj Abraham chi' t'a spatic, ix yilan winh ayek' jun nok' ch'ac calnel sut'ancan sch'ac t'a skal jun te' q'uiix. Ix b'at lemnaj winh yik'cot nok', ix snhusan nok' winh silab'il sq'uexuloc winh yuninal chi'.
Ix yak'ancan sb'i jun lugar chi' winh: Ha Jehová tz'ak'an tas tz'och cuuj. Yuj chi' syalnhej eb' anima icha tik: Ha t'a lum vitz a Jehová tz'ak'an tas tz'och cuuj, xchi eb'.
Ix yalanxiemta yángel Jehová chi' t'a winh:
--Ha in ton Jehová in swala': Yujto ix a k'anab'ajej a k'ulan jun tik, maj a tenek' ak'an jun pitanh uninal t'ayin, yuj chi' svak' in ti',

t'a wal yel ol vak' in wach'k'olal t'a ib'anh. Ol vak' q'uib' sb'isul inhtilal, icha q'uen k'anal t'a satcha’anh, ma icha pax yarenail sti' ha' mar. Anhejtona' pax eb' inhtilal ol yak' ganar eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'a eb'.
Yujto ix a k'anab'ajej tas ix vala', yuj chi' masanil nación t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik ol scha in wach'k'olal yuj eb' inhtilal, xchi t'a winh.
Ixlajwi chi', ix meltzajxi winhaj Abraham chi' yet' winh yuninal b'aj aycan chavanh eb' schecab', junxonhej ix aj smeltzaj eb' t'a Beerseba chi', ata' ix cajnajcan eb'.
Ayic ix ek' jun tiempo, ix yab'an specal winhaj Abraham chi' to ayxo yuninal winh yuk'tac winh, aton winhaj Nacor yet' ix Milca.
Ha winh sb'ab'el unin eb', Uz sb'i winh. Ha winh schab'il Buz sb'i winh, haxo winh yoxil Kemuel sb'i winh, aton winh smam yichamcan eb' Aram.
Ix aljipax winhaj Quesed, winhaj Hazo, winhaj Pildas, winhaj Jidlaf yet' winhaj Betuel.
Aton vajxacvanh eb' winh tik yune' ix Milca yet' winhaj Nacor chi'. Ha winhaj Betuel chi', aton winh smam ix Rebeca.
Ay juntzanhxo eb' yuninal winhaj Nacor yet' junxo ix yetb'eyum scuch Reúma, aton winhaj Teba, winhaj Gaham, winhaj Tahas yet' winhaj Maaca.
